column4: can anyone help me,My hardy is suffering from some kind of gnome graphics problem. my hardy is not showing its panels(Application Bar and task bar).
press alt-f2, type gnome-panel, and hit enter
when i typed gnome-panel at terminal, it said that this program is not installed.
then i did sudo apt-get install gnome-panel. OK?
what are you looking at now?
but its still not showing the panel.
i think i need a restart, let me restart
i said "indian_munnda: what are you looking at now?"
thank you, u solved my problem. you got my point right. :)
i was looking for it for 2 hours here, and noone was getting me right. may be laguage problm. :0
i reinstalled gnome-panel and restarted my system.
i meant how did you fix it? what did you do to fix it?
oh, ok. It might also be a good idea to run sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop incase anything else is missing
